Apple stock a buy: Valuation
Apple’s stock is now trading at $162.95 a share, any dip could be a buying opportunity. The stock’s average 12-month price target is $190.24, according to the 31 analysts who rate it. $AMD $NVTA $AAPL $MSFT  bears out in full force this weekend. We get it. The nasdaq is selling down. Show me a market timer or chartist that is wealthy? 
Millions a 
upon millions of people have created long term wealth in the mkt over time.  
Mkt timers just try to push fear or sell you subscriptions. For every timer that mad a big score, there are thousands upon thousands that went broke. Lastly most of these mkt timers that you hear of are one hit wonders that fade into oblivion as they try to "wow" people with their next big call 
Paulson= gold 
Ackman General growth 
Kathy Woods =Tesla 
The big short guy = Housing 
They rarely hit grand slams 2x. 
Millions of retirees have HUGE accounts by just buying a little over time. 
Block out the noise
